decision_conditions: Condition 3 (Materials) of planning permission 23/00006/FUL requires the submission of samples of facing materials which the applicant has not submitted. Furthermore, Officers do not consider the use of grey tiles for vertical walls to be approproiate to the historic site context. As such, the details submitted do not fully comply with the condition and it has not been demonstrated that the proposal would ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, contrary to policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Condition 5 (Details) of planning permission 23/00006/FUL requires the submission of detailed drawings at a scale of 1:10 / 1:20 of windows and doors. The applicant has only submitted standard drawings of the windows with no detailed drawings of the windows and doors in situ and so it has not been demonstrated that the proposal would ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, contrary to policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 3 (Materials) and 5 (Details) of planning permission 23/00006/FUL (Erection of basement extension, single storey side extension, loft conversion with front and rear facing dormers and south west facing solar PV array)
